title: (03710) Calpe - 6D Partida Gargasindi
description: Tarmac parking near a school. No service. Calm.

title: (03710) Calpe - 1B Calle María Jorro
description: Free parking near the center, view of the Peñón d'Ifach.

title: (03710) Calpe - 6 Av de los Ejércitos Españoles
title_short: (03710) Calpe - 6 Av de los Ejércitos Españoles
description: Water source

title: (03710) Calpe - 5 Avenida Valle de Laguart
description: Washing adapted to CC and generous weather and gasoline service station!

title: (03710) Calpe - 3 Partida Manzanera
description: Drinking water point. Good clearance for larger bottles and parking right next to it. Also right next to Muralla Rojo an interesting residential building.

title: (03710) Calp - 4D Avenida Pais Valencià
description: Free municipal parking for all vehicles, convenient for daytime parking and for overnight stays. It is brightly lit in the evening, the spaces are sized for cars but also longer campers, protruding a little, can park. We stayed for two nights and had a great time. It is very close to the beach (12 min on foot), to a series of eating places and several supermarkets. On Wednesdays you have to leave it empty because there is the market!

title: (03710) Calp - 9 Urbanizacion Pla Roig II
description:
Parking day and night on the side of the road. sign says it's ok for motorhomes . looks as if there us space for around 10 campers. 
it is located very close to the motorhome park
UPDATE 10/01/19
Just got moved on by Police who say no parking allowed on roads in Calpe, need to be away by 8pm...

name: Camping Calp - Mar
title: (03710) Camping Calp - Mar
description: Campsite Calp - Mar. Very nice campsite. 100 medium and large pitches. Plot on gravel and tarpaulin if you want shade. Pool. 100 meters from the beach with its restaurants, bars, shops and close to the town centre. Lidl shop 300m away.

title: (03710) Calpe - 3I Partida Oltamar
description: Splendid quiet corner in the mountain, available WC, shower sink for the dishes. certain place of these 2 small car parks are flat!

title: (03710) Calpe - 6 Calle Estonia
description: New area

title: (03710) Calpe - 43A Partida Marisol Park
description: A quietly located camperpark especially for campers in beautiful Calpe on the Costa Blanca. With swimming pool and bar, but still very affordable.

title: (03710) Calp - 26A Partida Pla del Mar
description: Fantastic quiet street location. Night parking on the streets is prohibited in Calpe.

name: Paraiso Camper
title: (03710) Paraiso Camper
description:
Paraiso Camper is a camper area located in Calpe (Alicante), exclusively for motorhomes and campers.
Rates range between €18.00 and €10.00 per night, depending on season and number of nights.
These rates include: normal plot (40-50 m2), 2 people, 2 pets, 10-amp electrical connection, WIFI for all devices, use of facilities: public bathrooms with WC and hot water showers, sinks and laundry rooms with hot water, drinking water, tank emptying and VAT. The pool is no longer available.
Paraiso Camper also has large pitches (over 50 m2 in size and 16-amp electrical connection), washing machines, dryer, baby changing table, iron and ironing board, clotheslines, video-surveillance cameras, fenced area throughout its perimeter, night lighting. Welcome to Paraiso Camper!!

title: (03710) Calpe - 45H Partida Maryvilla
description: Steep and winding paved road up, drive slowly, not suitable for motorhomes. At the end of the residential area and starting point for hiking route on cliffs. Only 1 place and you must be good at turning in small area. Spectacular views. Keep it clean

name: Camping La Merced
title: (03710) Camping La Merced
description: Permanent mature site. Quieter the further you move away from the main (though not busy) road. Amenities are dated but clean and perfectly usable. Has a small bar and light restaurant at site entrance.  Has both shaded and sunny pitches.

name: Mediterraneo Camper
title: (03710) Mediterraneo Camper
description: Area in Calpe managed by Ricardo. Toilets, showers, bar, washing machines, dryers. Reception from 9 a.m. to 5 p.m. / 3 p.m. (on weekends).

title: (03710) Calpe - 4 Calle Finlandia
description: Free parking on both sides of the avenue. Forbidden to sleep in his vehicle in CALPE, at 20h you must have joined an area or a campsite.

title: (03710) Calpe - 2 Calle Teulada
description: Quite large and fenced esplanade, in front is a hotel and approximately 100 meters from the promenade and the beach.

title: (03710) Calp - 66 Carrer Xaloc
description: Water tap with push button.

title: (03710) Calpe - 15C Avenida Rosa de los Vientos
title_short: (03710) Calpe - 15C Avenida Rosa de los Vientos
description: City Hall parking, 5 euros. no services, door closed. I have seen a lady enter with a key

title: (03710) Pueblo Mascarat - 1P Partida Mascar-toix Sup
description: Parking in a perfect urbanization to visit the Canyó del Mascarat

title: (03590) Altea - 11-35 Calle Ronda del Atardecer
description: A quiet place to spend the night or be parked during the day with stunning views of the walls of Morro de Toix that overlook the sea. To access the cove there is a path that is accessed from a street with signs (without exit) there is a kind of circle to make the turn, in that same semicircle you can also park and there is a door with access to the path. be careful when going down that is a bit steep

title: (03590) Altea - 20Z Carrer Freu
description: Small square. Possibility to stay overnight. Very beautiful view. However, there is a lot of traffic and unfortunately there is a lot of rubbish lying around. As a stop when driving through ok. We were able to turn 7.35m with our camper. More cars will be parked in the morning.

title: (03590) Altea - 10D Calle Currica
description: Parking spaces on the side of the road at the entrance to a beautiful beach

title: (03720) - 7 Calle dels Botils
description: It is called Magraner Park which has picnic tables, sinks, barbecue area and 2 large and very nice bathrooms. It has about 10 squares of about 6/7 meters. It is a very quiet area where you can spend the night. It takes about 5 minutes to get there but the GPS can mess you up. Be careful to put in the gps C / Magraner that is in the same area but you cannot find the Park. Recommended place to avoid penalties in the Advocat cove area for the signs they have put up this year. We did not take photos.

title: (03720) Benissa - 38 Avinguda de Pedramala
description: It is a parking lot next to the road between Calpe and Benissa. To sleep 1 night well.

title: (03590) Altea - 7 Calle Currica
description: Quiet place, with shadow, flat and with very good views. We spent the afternoon and evening without problems. Perfect for pets and od course it's situated at the beach so it's prime location if you enjoy swimming or just sunbathing

title: (03720) Benissa - 90 Avinguda de Fanàdix
description:
Beautiful place, one of the few where there is no parking / camper parking ban.
We spent several nights every other day, a lot of police passed but they didn't tell us anything.
shade most of the day and super quiet apart from for the cars that keep going by.
clean and fully equipped bathrooms, No shower.

title: (03720) - 71X Partida Fanadix
description: Small private place near the coast under pine trees.

title: (03720) Pinós - 66 Partida Pinos
description: Wonderful place, quiet and safe in the middle of nature. Space for several motorhomes about 3. Clean and shaded...

title: (03590) Altea - 5EC Calle Isla de Altea
description: Below the main road parking lot of a residence which was not built very flat accessible to any size of motorhome Tarmac no service Quiet at night We slept well there

title: (03590) Altea - 14 Plaça Mar y Montaña S.U.4
title_short: (03590) Altea - 14 Plaça Mar y Montaña S.U.4
description: Quiet little marina next to parking space has water and toilets good nights sleep no problems 50 m walk to the beach

title: (03599) Altea la Vella - 30 Partida Olla
description: Parking at the top of a dead end. Driveway fitted out with places, accessible to the large volume vehicle. Good for one night, not far from Portosenso port. We slept there without any problem with our ducato maxi. There is air because in height and nice point of view with sunset. However, it is located at the top of the National so there is non-stop traffic and some waste lying around on the site (papers...). You can see the satellite view of this place with Google maps.

title: (03590) Altea - 3 Urbanización Villa Gadea
description: the views are spectacular and the place is very quiet, a few fishermen and other vans but all respecting us, the dog beach nearby and the beach bar under the parking lot, at the entrance he puts a do not pass sign the night

title: (03590) Altea - 3Z Urbanización Villa Gadea
description: Parking next to the beach with incredible views. Spectacular sunrises. Very cool walk all over the beach. We have been this Easter (2018) and without any problem. We have always been a few vans / motorhomes. To go to town you have to park in another parking lot. There are some toilets for those mobiles, which are closed at night, there are fountains on the way down to the beach and some cafes very close. Pets are allowed on the beach, as long as they are tied up in the sand and loose in the water.

title: (03590) Altea - 3Z Urbanización Villa Gadea
description: Water Source. Low pressure so it will take some time to refill a canister but still nice to have.

title: (03720) Benissa - 29 Calle Cami de Beniver
description: We are in Benissa it's a bit of a secluded car park next to a quiet road lighted lovely views of the town of Calp now early February nothing to do I think staying overnight with the motorhome shouldn't be a problem.

title: (03720) -
description: Nice views, spectacular sunrise. Access by road in poor condition but accessible. Several hiking trails around. In hunting season it is usually customary for hunters to gather in the house to eat. Let's respect the environment please.

title: (03590) Altea - 20 Partida la Olla
description: Small online parking in front of the beach. It is narrow. Recommended for camper / van. Lovely sunset. Several restaurants and beach bars nearby. In high season it may be full.

title: (03720) Benissa - 15 Avinguda del País Valencià
description: Unpaved official parking lot. View of the landscape. Good for a shorter walk into town. Since there is an official parking space with disposal, you should use it for the night.

title: (03590) Altea - 83 Partida la Olla
description: CAMPINGAZ GAS BOTTLES 907 here // address: Ferreteria La Olla - Brico Altea SL, Partida, Cap-negret, 61, bajo D, 03590 Altea

title: (03720) Benisa - 6 Costera del Povil
description:
Swimming pool with clean and hot showers! Great way to swim a few laps, use the jacuzzi and then shower ☺️ Bathing caps are required for the pool but can be purchased at reception if they have stock
Flip-flops also required to walk in swimming section, may or may not be purchased
Padlock required for lockers, may be borrowed at reception
Very helpful staff

title: (03727) Jalón - 2-4 CV-749
description: Free camping in the middle of nature, ideal for walking or mountain biking, you can spend the night without problems, very quiet, the only thing that access is a little bad because it is a path with the loose stone *** do not turn right at the recycling bins, this takes you to the restaurant... instead carry on up the road until you see the visible camping sign on a right turn dirt track.. Google maps satellite view shows the exact dirt track and location *** the track is now paved.

title: (03720) Benisa - 12 Avenida Europa
description: Free water (I don't know if it's drinkable) and air at the Plenoil gas station

title: (03727) - 7A Camino Bernia Carretera
description: Beautiful place next to Bernia peak, next to a restaurant. Tranquil site among the pines.

title: (03720) Benissa - 39 Partida Berdica
description: Small location about 10 km from Calpe to spend the night. The station is no longer in service.

title: (03590) Altea - Unnamed Road
description: The picnic area is only for vans, the road is not accessible to RVs and large vehicles. We slept very well one night. There are many hikers climbing the Bernia Forat on weekends or public holidays

name: Camping Moraira
title: (03724) Camping Moraira
description: Camping "Moreira" shaded, located in the small seaside town of Moraira. Great view, dog and free Wi-fi. I think it's the period, very clean sanitary.

title: (03720) Benissa - Camí de Canor
description: Dedicated overnight spaces for motorhomes at rear of industrial area with Lidl and LPG station close by. Grey disposal awkwardly designed for larger vans so may need hose. Black disposal fine. Water pressure excellent but unusually needs small thread adapter. Some nice walks and bike trails around. Quiet spot at night.

title: (03599) Altea - 77 Partida Riquet
description: Beautiful place, overlooking the ridges of Bèrnia. Room for 2 vans max. Access to the final stretch of dirt road, accessible only for vans, lately only 4x4.

title: (03599) Alacant - 5 Partida Riquet
description: Ample parking space just outside Altea la Vella. Ideal for one night stay. The place is quite flat.

title: (03720) Benissa - 23 Partida Collado
description: Parking area next to the tennis club and the public pool with hot showers, a very cool bar and wooded area. Very calm.

title: (03590) Altea - 608 Cap-negret
description: Parking area nearby the Algar’s river end and Platja del Cap Negret. Some noise, due to it is under the bridge of the north entrance street to Altea.

title: (03590) Altea - 50 Camí de l'Algar
description: Very large asphalted parking, quite well leveled, without services ... but very quiet. Tuesdays they put flea market ...

title: (03729) Senija - 38 Carrer Verge dels Desamparats
description: Very good street to sleep, great reception by the neighbors. Senija is a must see and a very peaceful place to sleep.

title: (03724) Moraira - 15 Calle Aitana
description: Parking in a pine forest next to the sea with shade, perfect for parking and spending the day without camping

title: (03720) - 40D Partida Canor
description: Quiet with CCTV cameras, BBQ grills, tables, chairs, toilet, petanque court 1km from town Be sure to call the number on the gate to be seated, do not just drive in.

title: (03590) Altea - Unnamed Road
description: In nature close to Sierra de Berna

title: (03590) Altea - 28 Camí de l'Algar
description: Good, spacious and safe parking. Day and night.

title: (03724) Moraira - 9A Paseo Senillar
description: Parking, we were there with a VW bus. From 9.00 a.m. paid. Maximum parking time 2 hours, including sea view and beach access.

title: (03724) Moraira - 20 Carretera Moraira a Calpe
description: Free day park. Must move on Thursday because Friday market on site. Fantastic access to Moraira which is lovely. Loads of restaurants and a nice clean beach.

title: (03720) Benisa - 12A Calle Juan de la Cierva
title_short: (03720) Benisa - 12A Calle Juan de la Cierva
description: Station with autogas

title: (03724) Moraira - 39 Carretera Moraira-Teulada
description: Free public parking. No overnight stay. No service but very close to the city center. Large parking lot. Fun fair at the end but not too much noise. Market every Friday morning in half of the parking lot, so stay away from this area (signs) and be aware that early noise is rising.

title: (03590) Altea - 27 Carrer Consell
description: There is a self-service laundry at the Repsol petrol station.

title: (03590) Altea - 14 Avinguda Comunitat Valenciana
description: Very clean, good smelling laundromat, 12kg, 16kg (30 min). Dryer (15min). There are sockets and a rubbish bin. Supermarket right next door! Parking in the area sometimes with a short walk but no problem.

title: (03590) Altea - 7 Camí de l'Algar
description: Municipal car park near the center of Altea, ideal for getting to know the city, we did not spend the night. Next to a Repsol service station.

title: (03724) Teulada - 28 Carretera Moraira-Teulada
description: Car wash machines...  THE DRYER DOES NOT WORK (ask before)

title: (03590) Valencian Community - 2 Partida Pontet
description: Drinking water for everyone, with possible parking place.

title: (03590) Altea - 4 Camí Vell d'Alacant
description: Site for small motorhomes. Mine is 7 meters, and somewhere I had to do maneuvers, and I skimmed hedges and branches. Once parked, it is a 5-minute walk from the promenade. And 10 minutes from the old town.

title: (03725) Teulada - CV-740
description: Small flat parking with tables

title: (03590) Altea - 7 Carrer Benidorm
description: Dirt parking lot, not paved and in fair condition, close to the center and free.

title: (03725) Teulada - 25 Avinguda del Mediterrani
description: Launderette, bring your own detergent. Open from 6:00 a.m. to 10:00 p.m. WiFi free of charge.

title: (03590) Altea - 2 Carrer d'Aturar
description: Small quiet parking in a small square at the end of a closed-end street. For small vans and motorhomes, our 5 meter motorhome with bikes tied to the rear fits perfectly

title: (03590) Altea - 35 Camí Vell d'Alacant
description: Parking along with the street. About 5 minutes walk to old town and 5 minutes to the beach.

title: (03724) Teulada - 7 Calle Puerto Espíndola
description: Several parking spaces 5 minutes from the beach. It has some shady spots and is fairly level. We only parked during the day as we didn't know if overnight stays were allowed.

title: (03725) Teulada - 2 Camí la Font Santa
description: Picnic area with tables, barbecues and playground. Lots of shade in the table area. In the afternoon, in the shade in the parking lot. Access to water and toilets. We didn't spend the night but it can be a good place, it looks calm. There are no prohibition signs.

title: (03590) Altea - 1 Avenida del Puerto
description: Free place 24 hours ideal close to restaurants, bars and the beach. wide place for large vehicles. easy to wait next door for a place to become available thanks to the bar "la brisa" and its terrace in full sun in December

title: (03590) Altea - 4 Avenida del Puerto
description: A street with hardly any traffic at night. 5' walk from the city center

title: (03729) Llíber - 56 Carrer Sant Roc
description: Very quiet place at the entrance of the city. Forbidden to motorhomes, only for vans

title: (03725) Teulada - 8 Polígono Residencial Ciudad Jar
description: Large free mixed gravel parking on 3 levels next to the quiet calm auditorium No shadow service in summer accessible to any size of motorhome with trailer

title: (03590) Altea - 16 Avenida del Puerto
description: They are streets at the end of the promenade, in front of the port it is prohibited for AC but the surrounding streets are not. You can park without problem.

title: (03727) Xaló - 50 Carrer de la Verge
description: Lacolada Launderette with 3 x washing machines and 2 x dryers. mMchines are 21kg, 16kg and 12kg. Detergent included and change machine

name: Camping Santa Clara
title: (03590) Camping Santa Clara
description: CAMPING SANTA CLARA (Partida Cap Blanch 11) Ideal to enjoy a healthy and relaxing stay. Located between orchards and 200 meters from the beach.

name: San Antonio Camper Park
title: (03590) San Antonio Camper Park
description: Open from September to May only. San Antonio Camper Park, Altea - sea view, caring couple, showers, toilets (with white toilet paper please), gray and black water disposal, wifi in reception and common area

name: Motorhome Park Xaló
title: (03727) Motorhome Park Xaló
description: Quiet place next to the supermarket. Saturday is the famous "Rastro" a few meters away (Saturday also used for car parking). This close to the village, as well as a park and wineries. Very friendly owner. (If the door is closed can open it the owner comes to be paid later)

title: (03726) Benitachell - 34 Calle Zurbarán
description: Quiet place to spend the night with a van and go to the beautiful cove LLebeig. It is the end of the road from which there is a path of about 500 m to the cove. The only drawback is that the water treatment plant is located in the urbanization above and perhaps someone might find it annoying. There is room for 3 vans.

title: (03729) Llíber -
description:
It is a very beautiful place, but the water no longer runs.
The climbing wall is too big.
the grade is hard

The site is sort of divided into parcels
Take care of the mountain please?

title: (03590) - 50 Partida Cap
description: Parking on stony ground we spent the night without worry we put ourselves at the bottom to not disturb

name: Camping Fonts de l'Algar
title: (03510) Camping Fonts de l'Algar
description: A campsite as well as caravans and mobile homes

title: (03727) Xaló - 61 Avinguda Rei Juan Carlos I
title_short: (03727) Xaló - 61 Avinguda Rei Juan Carlos I
description: Mixed parking space, free, on the outskirts of the village, straight spots, no amenities, nice village to visit. parking is not allowed here on Friday evening / Saturday due to flea market.

title: (03510) Callosa d'en Sarrià - 14 Partida Algar
description: It is a field, with good views

title: (03518) Tàrbena - 7 Partida Coll de Rates
description: Parking at coll de rates, right next to the restaurant, there is no sign prohibiting overnight stays,

title: (03510) Callosa d'en Sarrià - 35 Partida Algar
description: Directly opposite the bar you can park here to visit the Fonts del A'lgar which is only 200mtrs away. and You are allowed to stay the night. Your parking ticket will give you a percentage off your bill in the bar opposite the bar park.

title: (03518) Tàrbena - 7 Partida Coll de Rates
description: Coll de Rates. Past the restaurant. Next to the access road to a viewpoint, so no car passed at night. Very good 360 ° views. It is not sheltered from the wind.

name: Camping Cap Blanch
title: (03581) Camping Cap Blanch
description: Altea, Carretera playa Cap Blanch, 25. Camping Cap Blanch. Altea, Carretera playa Cap Blanch, 25. Camping Cap Blanch by the sea (pebble beach) mainly dutch customers . The prices are higher in high season.

address.street: Carretera de la Playa de Cap-Blanch

title: (03510) Alicante - 25 Partida Algar
description: Dirt parking where a guy comes and charges you to park all day. Overnight is not allowed. 15 minutes to the entrance of Las Fuentes. Following the road there is more parking but the road is narrow.

title: (03518) Callosa d'en Sarrià - 147 Partida Algar
description: Parking Tourist Office Las Fuentes del Algar.

title: (03726) Benitatxell - 241J Calle Jazmines
description: Quiet place with great views

title: (03726) El Poble Nou de Benitatxell - 207J Calle Jazmines
title_short: (03726) El Poble Nou de Benitatxell - 207J Calle Jazmines
description: Dead end street in the middle of nature, with impressive views, located in an unbuilt urbanization, we have spent the afternoon and night, police cars have passed at night and we have not had a problem

title: (03726) Benitachell - 19J Calle Jazmines
description: Puig viewpoint. Viewpoint with views of the entire coast and not very crowded. The site is beautiful, it has incredible views since it is at the top, you see the sea and the entire coast.

title: (03518) Tàrbena - 1 Partida Coll de la Creu
title_short: (03518) Tàrbena - 1 Partida Coll de la Creu
description: Stop for the night, place near the road but no passage. Picnic table next to the parking lot. Very quiet in the middle of nature.

name: Mosquera Camping
title: (03792) Mosquera Camping
description: Nice place to park in nature, mountain views along with walking trails. Water available but non drinking.

title: (03581) l'Alfàs del Pi - 26 Carrer Centaure
description: Parking on the ground a little uneven ideal to park the camper to visit the lighthouse with beautiful landscapes. already has a marked park but only to park small cars

title: (03726) les Fonts - 16-140 Urbanització les Fonts
description: Lovely wooden playground with picnic tables to have lunch. Not much shade but restaurant close by.

title: (03726) El Poble Nou de Benitatxell - 97A Urbanització les Fonts
title_short: (03726) El Poble Nou de Benitatxell - 97A Urbanització les Fonts
description: Plot with restaurant (and private parking) in the middle of the park. If you’d like to reserve a spot please message Aaron on WhatsApp. No electricity, no water, toilet cleaning options. But when the restaurant is open (Monday, Thursday, Friday and weekend) you can use the facilities.‬

name: Parking Albir Faro
title: (03581) Parking Albir Faro
description: Parking lot at the start of the faro and park trails, steeply sloping. Sea and mountain view.

title: (03510) Alicante - 19 Partida Clots
description: Parking next to the cemetery, good to spend the night, and in the morning park in the information and tourism parking, which is free. (Perfect to see the fountains of algar) 7.5m motorhome no problem

title: (03726) Cumbre del Sol - 5J Calle Jazmines
description:
Puig de la Llorença - Cumbre del Sol
At the antennas are many spots to park.
Attention: The way up ist very steep!!
But you get 360° of view.
With strong winds it's not recomendable to go there.
When you reach the antennas and turn right you will find parking bays perfect for a caravan.

title: (03518) Bolulla - 21 Lugar Diseminados
description: A little corner, almost quiet, on the edge of the road that helps out, a little dirty, we have to clean up to feel better, not easy to find a spot to sleep in this corner. It is located not far from the fonts of the algar. We had a clear night which allowed us to appreciate a quite beautiful view of the stars.

name: Camperpark Costa Blanca, S.L.
title: (03580) Camperpark Costa Blanca, S.L.
description: The zone is located in a quiet area on a plot surrounded by orange groves and only 1 km from the beach Albir and 1 km from the center of Alfaz del Pi with all amenities within walking distance: restaurants, McDonalds, bakery comes here every day, supermarkets, DIY, taxis, banks, post etc. Train Stop 600 meters with hourly connections to Benidorm, Altea and Alicante.

title: (03581) l'Alfàs del Pi - 64 Avenida de l'Albir
title_short: (03581) l'Alfàs del Pi - 64 Avenida de l'Albir
description: Parking, paved esplanade, public and free, except on market days. We only stayed there for a short time. It is sloping.

name: Orange Grove, Camper Park
title: (03580) Orange Grove, Camper Park
description: Private motorhome area with swimming pool in the middle of the orange grove 2 km from Playa Albir and 6 km from Benidorm.

title: (03726) Benitachell - Travesía Playa
description: Parking of Cala Moraig and Cala Testos. ideal for a route to the llebeig cove called the cliffs. Supermarket very close, there is also a pharmacy.

title: (03581) l'Alfàs del Pi - 10 Cami de la Cantera
title_short: (03581) l'Alfàs del Pi - 10 Cami de la Cantera
description: Very well placed car park, close to all amenities and the beach.

title: (03726) El Poble Nou de Benitatxell - Camí de la Torreta
title_short: (03726) El Poble Nou de Benitatxell - Camí de la Torreta
description: The parking is 15 euro a night and please reserve on WhatsApp

title: (03580) l'Alfàs del Pi - 23 Avinguda d'Europa
description: Lacolada laundromat with 4x washing machines (2x12kg and 2x16kg and three dryers (18kg). The machines only takes coins, there is a bill changing machine available. There is a table to fold laundry. Parking for large vehicles available. WiFi also available, but password protected and for the car you have to call a phone number. Not far away, next to the McDonald's, there is a restaurant where you can get free WiFi (from the parking lot).

title: (03530) Alicante - 27 Captivador
description: Good views and shady drinking water next to the hermitage and a great option of routes on foot and by mtb

name: Park Autocaravanas Alcalalí
title: (03728) Park Autocaravanas Alcalalí
description: Parking for Motorhomes, beautiful roads and trails for hiking and cycling surrounded by mountains, beaches 15 minutes away. All services police gas stations supermarkets private schools All services are covered by a Repsol gas station that is next door, it closes at 24:00 at night and opens at 6:00 in the morning. It has a supermarket with good prices, daily bread, coffee, and tables for breakfast.

title: (03530) El Tossal - 28 Captivador
description: Quiet place in the shade of a pine forest, close to mountain bike trails. There is a water point in the parking lot of the hermitage a little lower.

title: (03530) Alicante - 25 Captivador
description: Parking in front of the hermitage with good shadows, fountain with drinking water, bike park in the middle of the forest and many options for routes

title: (03726) Benitachell - 122E Polígono Pp Cds Encinas
description: Free parking area to access Cala Moraig, here you can leave your car or van and walk downstairs. There is a bit to the beach with steep slopes

title: (03518) Tárbena - s/n Avenida Eusebio Signes
description: New free motorhome area of the town hall. It has 4 spaces equipped with electricity, drinking water and sewage drainage. (It does not have a drain for gray water). The area is located within a public parking lot, within the town of Tarbena. A small charming town located inland, with beautiful views. The town has a supermarket, pharmacy, bars, restaurants, and in summer access to the pool with the right to use the showers and services. It is recommended to know the place, its gastronomy as well as the history of this characteristic place.

title: (03510) - 1C Partida Pla de Galbis
description: An esplanade of very flat land to spend the night without problems, quiet and very well lit! You have a shop and restaurant 5 minutes walk away !!

title: (03726) El Poble Nou de Benitatxell - 486 Plaça Res. de Ensanche
title_short: (03726) El Poble Nou de Benitatxell - 486 Plaça Res. de Ensanche
description: Municipal sports center shower. A 10/10.

title: (03518) Bolulla - 26 Carrer Major
description: Sleeping area next to the Bolulla River, 200 meters from the town of Bolulla. Very quiet and safe area to sleep. Wooded area that gives a lot of shade.

title: (03726) Benitachell - 1A Calle Pp Cds Iris
description: If you go to Cala Moraig, it's perfect to spend the night and then pay for regulated parking during the hours, since all regulated parking lots have unevenness

title: (03510) Callosa d'en Sarrià - 9 Camí Falset
description: Flat parking on land. Supermarket nearby and 40 min walk from the fountains to visit.

title: (03726) Benitachell - 80B Polígono Pp Cds Begonias
description: Very quiet place in an urbanization in a cul-de-sac, we park discreetly in the evening and spend the night without problems without traffic of people or vehicles.

title: (03580) l'Alfàs del Pi - 26 Cami del Devesa
title_short: (03580) l'Alfàs del Pi - 26 Cami del Devesa
description: Place surrounded by nature with shade. Very calm

title: (03510) Callosa d'en Sarrià - 10 Carrer Sant Isidre
title_short: (03510) Callosa d'en Sarrià - 10 Carrer Sant Isidre
description: Gas station near the Fuentes de L'Algar, you can refuel and they have a fountain with good access to refill water if you need. Very nice and willing.

title: (03726) El Poble Nou de Benitatxell - 2A Calle Pp Cds Fresnos
title_short: (03726) El Poble Nou de Benitatxell - 2A Calle Pp Cds Fresnos
description: Skatepark parking. Next to an urbanization. Very quiet place. Bar very close.

title: (03581) l'Alfàs del Pi - 24 Partida Albir Zona I
title_short: (03581) l'Alfàs del Pi - 24 Partida Albir Zona I
description: Very good self service car wash next to the gas station, behind the automatic car wash. Machine only accepts 1 euro coins. Perfect to wash your motorhome because of the small steps next to it so you can easily clean your roof.

name: Bar Planet
title: (03792) Bar Planet
description: A pub/ restaurant with a car park. English run pub and restaurant that welcome you to stop over for the night. Vicky the bar maid is very welcoming. The car park is small but accessible. The beer is cold and cheap. Just how we like it.

title: (03580) l'Alfàs del Pi - 9 Camí del Barranquet
title_short: (03580) l'Alfàs del Pi - 9 Camí del Barranquet
description: Municipal parking, nice town, stayed 2 nights

title: (03518) Tárbena - CV-752
description: Nice place flat and gravel for about 8 vehicles. Picnic facilities, views of the coast. Satisfactory mobile phone. Unsuitable in strong winds .. No prohibition signs.

title: (03580) Alfaz del Pi - 15 Avenida País Valencià
title_short: (03580) Alfaz del Pi - 15 Avenida País Valencià
description: Parking lot to explore the city, nothing special, not nice, but free. Slight incline.

title: (03520) Polop - 1C Carrer Nou de Octubre
description: Flat parking very close to the old town

name: Camping Internacional Almafra
title: (03503) Camping Internacional Almafra
description: Camping Almafra. A campsite in Benidorm to rest, relax and enjoy with family, friends or as a couple. With restaurant and entertainment, near the beach and the mountains ... Do not hesitate.

name: Camping La Media Legua
title: (03503) Camping La Media Legua
description: Camping La Media Legua

title: (03510) Callosa d'en Sarrià - 26 Partida Font
description: Nice place for the picnic. Table, water and flat pitches.

title: (03530) La Nucia - 55 CV-715
description: Auto Laundry service Laundry service. From 3.5 euros washer, dryer from 2 euros Washer from 3.5, dryer from 2 euros

title: (03530) La Nucia - 2 Pasaje Muixara
description: Sports complex parking, an option if you want something more than beach, has trekking routes, paddle tennis facilities, football, beach soccer, gym covered pavilion, heated pool and jacuzzi, climbing area with large exterior wall, play area children, restaurant, bmx circuit, skateparck, trial area for bike and motorcycle, public toilets.

title: (03530) La Nucia - 55 Avinguda de la Marina Baixa
title_short: (03530) La Nucia - 55 Avinguda de la Marina Baixa
description: Tarmac car park with palm trees and longer spaces on the side opposite the entrance. High season sometimes full during the day. Winter without problem. Supermarkets at 2min - 2 large flea markets every Sunday

title: (03503) Benidorm - 87 Polígono Apr 3
description: Large gravel parking lot. Rubbish bins nearby and a market that offers a nice junk on Thursdays, Saturdays and Sundays.

title: (03530) La Nucia - 6B Polígon Industrial l'Alberca
description:
Approached via a short, rough track, this large area among pine trees is flat and hard. It's used by a handful of locals, including one or two cars overnight. No signs. Quieter than the tarmac car park next door (which has a playground for young kids) - you don't feel that you're on the edge of a town, and can hardly see any buildings. Surrounded by abandoned agricultural terraces. 100m from a pizzeria, 200m from a very good Mexican restaurant. Some shade from the pine trees.
To get to it, approach the entrance of the tarmac car park, then take the track almost opposite it (see photo), turning left just before the top of the slope.

title: (03520) Polop - 2A Carrer Carretera Xirles
description: The land is outside the village of Polop, next to the cemetery. Easy access. Open, bright and quiet place at the foot of the mountains.

title: (03503) Benidorm - 78 Polígono Apr 3
description: Small parking lot belonging to the market.

title: (03530) La Nucia - 110 Avinguda de la Marina Baixa
title_short: (03530) La Nucia - 110 Avinguda de la Marina Baixa
description: 24 hour gas station, there is no drinking water cartel, it is a gas station source. Low pressure gun, but it's free!

name: Camping Benisol
title: (03502) Camping Benisol
description: Almafrá, 10 Avinguda of the Comunitat Valenciana. Camping Benisol

title: (03530) La Nucia - 6 Carrer de Guadalest
description: Drinking water at the service station.

title: (03520) Polop - 4 Lugar 11 Pd Pla Terol
description: Quiet public car park without prohibitions. In addition to an integrative kindergarten and the sports field. Despite the many trees, satellite TV is also possible. trash can available.

title: (03739) Xàbia - 134 Camì de les Cansalades
description: Service area for motorhomes courtesy of Jávea Town Hall. Trash cans next door and restaurant bar. Right in front of the restaurant, an old campsite, empty, clean white gravel ground… but closed.

title: (03750) - 3 Partida Golfes
description: Drinking water source. Free.

name: Camping Benidorm
title: (03503) Camping Benidorm
description: Benidorm, CV-753. Camping Villamar in Benidorm

name: Camping Benidorm Bungalows
title: (03503) Camping Benidorm Bungalows
description: Camping Benidorm Bungalows. Amazing showers! we didn't stay the night but they let us pay  to use the showers. lovely big, clean facilities. they also have a laundry, I think you pay at the reception for that too but it's only open in the mornings according to signage.

title: (03738) Jávea - 25 Avenida del Tio Catala
description: Small esplanade of land behind a beach bar. Shaded area. Many cars in the early hours of bathers going down to the cove. There are two restaurants. The cove is beautiful pebbles with high occupation in summer

name: Camping Arena Blanca
title: (03503) Camping Arena Blanca
description: Great campsite where it is good to stay, there are many winter visitors. Everything is well arranged with water, electricity and drainage at your place. You are about 1.5 km from the center of Benidorm. Swimming pool available that can be closed in winter so you can still enjoy swimming. Also restaurant available. Holiday homes can also be rented, check their website for that. We have been coming here for several years with complete satisfaction. Also a free good WIFI for every telephone present.Veel Dutch and very cosy.Op most places good satellite reception. If you don't have a satellite dish and you still want to watch TV, that's also possible, they have a free cai connection at every place. You must have a TV or laptop yourself and a few meters of coax cable. ???

title: (03750) - 37 Carrer Pou del Posmó
description: Day and night parking next to the IES. no ban. Convenient and quiet on Saturday evening to walk to the Sunday morning rastro. possibility to take water in the park reserved for dogs

title: (03792) Murla - 5C Calle Cruz
description: Flat asphalt car park overlooking town with mountain views. Recommend for nice quiet parking spot for night and hikes up mountain behind or valley below.

name: Camping Racó
title: (03503) Camping Racó
description: Camping Raco. Large well equipped campsite with indoor and outdoor pools. Children’s playground. Water, waste, EHU & TV hook up on all pitches.

title: (03792) Alicante - 1 Partida Ambellund
description: Parking at Murla swimming pool. Approx. 30 car parking spaces, flat. Very quiet. A few cars and a few walkers during the day. Hike to the Castle of Orba. Drinking water fountain at the sports facility.

title: (03759) Benidoleig - 9A Rincón Silencio
description: Site at the door of the caves, next to it there are picnik tables, there is no sign of parking or prohibitions. The road passes by, we spent the night without problems.

title: (03530) La Nucia - 4 Avinguda de Coloma
description: Lacolada laundromat with 3x washing machines (2x12kg and 1x16kg and two dryers (18kg).the machines only take coins , an exchange machine for bills is available. There is a table to fold laundry. Parking for 3 spaces in front of the door. (rather up to van size)

title: (03738) Xàbia - 30 Carretera de la Granadella
description: Wonderful place in the middle of the green, 1km from the beach. there is a table, small trash bins and games for children. no sources The street is right next door but not many cars pass by. I recommend!!

title: (03502) Benidorm - 17 Polígono Apr 3
description:
Laundry plus a separate machine for pet bedding. Price correct as of February 2023.
There is also a jetwash station with a raised platform for campervans.

title: (03749) Dénia - 7 Carrer del Convent
description:
A lovely stop over village having wonderful surrounding.. Very quiet on the edge of a typical Spanish township. It's worth a walk-around. Shops, pubs and restaurants within walking distance.

hi you all travlers,i live next to the parking,if you need any help ,
i am a boat macanic,and have loads of tools etc.we have a nice backyard where you can relax with a cup of thea are coffee.
Boudewijn Stastra

title: (03520) Polop - Polígon Pla de Cantal.
description: There is a parking lot next to a helicopter area. Perfect for hiking. Very quiet during the week. There are campers here. Police came by during the day. I don't know if it's allowed for the night but I think so.

title: (03503) Benidorm - 13 Avenida de Malta
description: Free parking right in front of the parking lot

title: (03503) Benidorm - 17F Calle de Moscú
description: Quiet place near the fenced and gravel Aqualandia and Mundomar water park, we slept two nights accompanied by several motorhomes

title: (03530) La Nucia - 14 Carrer Rembrandt
description: Quiet pine forest for the night. Absolute silence.

title: (03739) Xàbia - 53 Travessera de les Cansalades
description: A very quiet place to fill the jerry cans with water and have a bite to eat in the shade of the pines. I don't know if it's possible to sleep there because the parking lot is close to a restaurant…

title: (03520) Polop - 26 Calle Córdoba
description: Parking under pine trees. slept very peacefully.

name: Camping La Torreta
title: (03503) Camping La Torreta
description: Camping La Torreta is located 1 km (10 minutes walk) from Rincón de Lois, on the Levante beach, and is the closest to the beach that exists in Benidorm. With pebble floor, has free swimming pool and children's games. It is very quiet and the services and showers are very clean. The bus stops very close and the campsite is within walking distance of Mundomar and Aquamar.

title: (03749) Dénia - Partida Jesús Pobre C, 3B
description: Great spacious parking to spend the morning on the Sunday market. Also fine to stay over night. Beautiful views.

name: Camping Villasol
title: (03503) Camping Villasol
description: Good camping but with its buts ... 1 the closest bus stop is a kilometer and a half away. something far away. very low trees. risk of hitting the motorhome. Those who say that walking to the center is ten minutes .. make them look at it .. minimum is more than 30 walking fast on a scooter if it will be 10 minutes since it is a bit far from the center .. everything else .. correct .. people nice and help you in everything. nice pool. I do not recommend the restaurant, it arrives all cold. they also receive people who are not inside the camping and those inside are left without a place to eat. the showers somewhat dated. to almost all the doors .. they are unlocked you can. ask for electricity if .. but .. for 4 days 4 kilowatts. it is insufficient if you spend it is your charge defining .. okay but ………….

address.street: 13 Avenida de l'Almirall Bernat de Sarria

title: (03794) Benigembla - 47 Carrer Nou
description: Good place to spend the night in the van. Quiet and just below the Cavall Verd mountain range.

title: (03794) Benichembla - 16 CV-720
description:
Beautiful little village surrounded by mountains.
We stopped off on route to Alcoy and so glad we did. The village has a lovely little Plaza with 2 bars. Bar gat did the best tapas ever. Plenty of walks around and routes for mountain biking. The parking has easy access for any size motorhome but no services.

name: Camping Armanello (Benidorm)
title: (03503) Camping Armanello (Benidorm)
description: Camping Armenello. Dated camping site.loads of old residents with disability scooter's .

title: (03503) Benidorm - 8A Calle de Moscú
description: Quiet and far enough from buildings to spend the night

title: (03503) Benidorm - 13 Avenida de l'Almirall Bernat de Sarria
title_short: (03503) Benidorm - 13 Avenida de l'Almirall Bernat de Sarria
description: Free parking without services near the beach where you can spend the night peacefully. We spent one night before going to Terra Mítica and met several ACs. During the day there are quite a few cars but at night they are gone.

address.street: 13 Avenida de l'Almirall Bernat de Sarria

title: (03503) Benidorm - 11 Carretera Albir
description: Free parking place suitable for motorhomes

title: (03503) Benidorm - 19 Calle de Londres
description: It is a road that leaves Benidorm towards the mountain. In summer it is very busy with cars from nearby hotels. It's fine for one night. It has no services, Nearby has viewpoints that you can see Benidorm from above.

title: (03738) Ambolo - 15 Urbanizacion Costa Nova Ambolo
description: Dead end street from the Ambolo viewpoint. There are tables that overlook the viewpoint and you have to leave the van on the side of the street to let people pass. It is not usually crowded. I think that for a motorhome it is a bit difficult to turn around, although I think it is possible up to 10m. Quiet area and spectacular views. There are climbing routes below the viewpoint and a beautiful cove.

title: (03503) Benidorm - 13 Avenida de Zamora
description: Free parking between hospital and sports club.

title: (03738) Jávea - 32 Calle Avutarda
description: Ample parking, quiet. advise.

title: (03792) Murla -
description: Small area of land to park three or so multivans at the end of a stretch of road. Quiet area with views of the mountain (cresta del cavall verd) and the valley. Several hiking trails very close. Ideal to spend the night.

title: (03510) Callosa d'en Sarrià - Unnamed road
description: Parking straight with no signs. Just

title: (03503) Benidorm - 11 Avenida de Zamora
description: Great find in the centre of Benidorm, been here several times now since January, always quiet and always places to park. Seen other motor homes parked here. Two minutes to walk in to town. The Sunday/Wednesday outdoor market at the top of this road.

name: Camping BENIGEMBLA
title: (03794) Camping BENIGEMBLA
description:
We have a beautiful place with great spots, quality facilities and the same service and attention as always. 16A electricity, water and Wi-Fi in all spots, quality bathrooms, laundry, gray and black water. Free attached sports area (swimming pool, paddle tennis, soccer, basketball, etc). Only non-barking pets allowed. Groups of
Young people, no parties, we are a quiet campsite.

address.street: Partida Les. Palmeres s/n.   Carretera Castell de Castells

title: (03503) Benidorm - 123 Avinguda de la Comunitat Valenciana
title_short: (03503) Benidorm - 123 Avinguda de la Comunitat Valenciana
description: Parking Mix next to a Park.

title: (03503) Benidorm - 24 Avenida la Vila Joiosa
description: Parking shaded by olive trees and arranged. There are no motorhome bans. near the center and beach

title: (03503) Benidorm - Calle Derramador
description: Place to spend the night without much noise. For the day, you can enjoy it down to the beach which lasts about 6 minutes. Shops nearby

title: (03503) Benidorm - 3 Calle Lérida
description: Large free level public car park. no signs to say no as MH stayed the night and visited Benidorm during our stay.

name: Trust Resort Canino
title: (03760) Trust Resort Canino
description: Trust Resort Canine. Camping with plots and bungalows. Dog specialist. It has a pool for dogs to play loose and bathe with their owners. It also has a normal bathing pool, for people. Lots of play areas for the dogs. They also have dog daycare, training, and a vet. You can go to the pool to spend the day without having to stay at the campsite. Ideal for anyone who travels with our furry ones.

title: (03738) Jávea - 24-84 Calle la Haya
description: It is possible to go into the vacant lot. Forbidden at night

title: (03730) Platja de L'arenal - 23C Calle Niza
description: Parking behind the urbanization near the supermarket and the beach during the day more cars pass but at night it is quiet

name: Camping El Naranjal
title: (03730) Camping El Naranjal
description: Beautiful shaded pitches on flat white gravel, with sails suspended in the trees, clean and spacious sanitary facilities, swimming pool with lifeguard... it's expensive but rather top notch. beach 10 minutes away with many restaurants and bars.

title: (03502) Benidorm - 47 CV-70
description: Repsol petrol station with autogas, AC wash with steps to do roof, launderette and free water. no black or grey waste disposal unfortunately.

title: (03503) Benidorm - 58 Avenida del Mediterráneo
description: Benidorm close to the beach

title: (03502) Benidorm - 7C Calle Cortés Roig
description: Cortes roig street. Quiet residential area. There is usually a place in low season. At 100 meters there is a police station. In the corner there is a park with games for children.
